title: Emerging investigator series: Suspended air nanobubbles in water can shuttle polystyrene nanoplastics to air-water interface

Nanoplastics in the environment are a great concern given their nanoscopic size, colloidal stability, and bio-recalcitrant and biomagnifying nature. They are detected ubiquitously in natural and built environments and pose...
